casebody.data:
SHAMEE CATWILMAT, LLC, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
SHAMEE DEVELOPMENT COMPANY, LLC, Jiten D. Shah, Cereal City Investments, Inc., and Michael A. Mead, Defendants-Appellees,
and
Advantage Home Builders, Inc., and Advantage Housing, Inc., Defendants. SC: 156236
COA: 330616 Supreme Court of Michigan. March 5, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the May 11, 2017 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.

WILDER, J., did not participate because he was on the Court of Appeals panel.
